item.title: Moments in the Abyss
item.description: Sometimes I just need a short-form space to put down some thoughts. This isn’t really a public thing. I’m not starting a newsletter. Most introspection is done introspectively. But sometimes it’s just easier to write it out. This week, I started waking up around 4:45am each day. It’s a better way to live. Previously, Tzipora was a late-sleeper – I think, considering how much better it is living alongside the sun, it makes more sense if she’s an early riser.
